title: Multi-Window Support in LibGDX
body:
Game restarted when I click on split window of LibGDX. 

Android 7.0 adds [support](https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/multi-window) for displaying more than one app at the same time. On handheld devices, two apps can run side-by-side or one-above-the-other in split-screen mode. I tried to use this feature in my LibGDX app/game.

Reproduction steps : 

1. Open any app that support multi window
2. Open LibGDX app/game
3. Performs a long press on the Overview button to switch into multi-window
4. LibGDX game window **turns into black** 
5. When I tap on LibGDX window, game Restart.

Version of LibGDX and/or relevant dependencies :

- LibGDX : 1.9.8
- Android target API : 28, 27
